suppress.notes: File name: spring-web-5.x.y.jar Suppressed for 3 months See https://companieshouse.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DEV/pages/4128604372/CVE-2016-1000027+-+spring-web It is unlikely that this library will be updated and therefore that the suppression will be removed. Each time this is reviewed, you should search the codebase of the app for uses of HTTPInvokerServiceExporter or RemoteInvocationSerializingExporter in the app. If they are not being used, then this exlusion can continue.
File name: json-20230227.jar Suppressed for 2 months CVE-2022-45688(7.5) still exists in most recent version. This should be checked regulary for a fix.

File name: guava-31.1-android.jar Suppressed for 2 months Requires changes to uk.gov.companieshouse.api-sdk-java, and the version of google oauth being pulled in, but this is already at the latest stable version which imports this version of guava with CVE-2023-2976 and CVE-2020-8908. This should be checked regulary for a fix.

File name: kafka-clients-3.0.0.jar Suppressed for 3 months Requires changes to uk.gov.companieshouse.ch-kafka and Needs >= 3.3.2 to fix CVE-2022-34917 and CVE-2023-25194. But we cannot go past 3.0.0 due to changes that are not compatible with ch-kafka, in particular idempotency which is turned on in version 3.0.1. ch-kafka should be regularly reviewed for changes to enable this change.

File name: snappy-java-1.1.8.1.jar Suppressed for 3 months CVE-2023-34453, CVE-2023-34454 and CVE-2023-34455 tequires changes to uk.gov.companieshouse.ch-kafka to fix. But the version is bound by the same issue as kafka-clients. Hence this needs to be supressed until ch-kafka is updated.

File name: spring-boot-actuator-autoconfigure-2.6.15.jar Suppressed for 3 months Needs > 2.7.11 to fix CVE-2023-20873, but this is not going to work with the current version of kafka in use with ch-kafka. Hence this needs to be supressed until ch-kafka is updated.
